thread.title: Scramble to draw up climate talks schedule
thread.title_full: Scramble to draw up climate talks schedule | News24

author: news24.com
title: Scramble to draw up climate talks schedule
text:
Bonn - UN diplomats scrambled on Friday to sew up a draft plan for tackling the urgent challenge of global warming, with just hours of negotiating time left ahead of a crucial summit in Paris.
On the closing day of technical talks in Bonn, which opened on Monday, rich and developing nations were still bickering about fundamentals of the pact that will determine the scale of greenhouse gas cuts and who should foot the bill.
Political compromises
The Bonn round was meant to come up with a clear and concise blueprint for a 195-nation agreement to be signed at a November 30-December 11 conference in Paris.
